name: The Void Club ch.4 2.0
description:
WARNING: MATURE CONTENT. This game contains mature themes, strong language, and strong sexual content. Viewer discretion is advised.

Another fine remake, with a nice addition, fight the Virus and make sure you bring the good girl back.
